pageContext.collection_description: Contains correspondence, including letters in German to Hermann Goering, fan mail, subject files used as background materials for radio broadcasts, 1948-1967, three scrapbooks, scripts for AP Newsfeatures and News of the World, 1937-1967, and other papers. Also contains two sound recordings of Beatty's 10th anniversary broadcast on News of the World, 1956, seven recordings of Beatty narrating for AP's The World in Sound, sound recordings of News of the World, 1959-1967, a 1966 videotape interview with Beatty and a film of a 1959 News of the World broadcast.
